feed.title: LF-Air
feed.subtitle: RSS feed based on RSS and LLM.

entry.title: Vite report on Sun, 12 Nov 2023 08:03:39
entry.summary:
Tech:
1. Prompt Engineering plus AlphaZero: Microsoft's XOT improves LLM's ability to generalize
- Microsoft's XOT (Cross-Objective Training) enhances the generalization ability of LLM (Language Model) by incorporating prompts and reinforcement learning techniques.
- XOT enables LLM to perform better on various tasks and domains, demonstrating improved flexibility and adaptability.

2. A Rusty CHERI â€“ The path to hardware capabilities in Rust [video]
- This video discusses the development of hardware capabilities in the Rust programming language.
- Rust's unique features and memory safety make it a promising choice for building secure and efficient hardware systems.
- The video explores the challenges and progress in implementing hardware capabilities in Rust.

3. SpaceX will launch the X-37B on a Falcon Heavy rocket Dec. 7
- SpaceX is scheduled to launch the X-37B spaceplane on December 7 using its Falcon Heavy rocket.
- The X-37B is an unmanned spacecraft used for various classified missions by the U.S. Air Force.
- This launch demonstrates SpaceX's capabilities in delivering payloads to space.

Business:
1. Creators are complaining that the TikTok Shop is turning the app into an ad-filled wasteland
- TikTok creators express concerns about the increasing number of ads on the platform's TikTok Shop feature.
- The influx of ads is seen as negatively impacting the user experience and the organic content creators' ability to reach their audience.

2. Wiley College to hold annual 2023 Fall Preview Day - Marshall News Messenger
- Wiley College announces its annual Fall Preview Day, providing prospective students with an opportunity to explore the college's programs and campus.
- The event aims to attract and engage potential students for the upcoming academic year.

3. Apple agrees to $25M settlement with US over hiring of immigrants
- Apple reaches a settlement with the U.S. government, agreeing to pay $25 million over allegations of discriminatory hiring practices against immigrants.
- The settlement resolves claims that Apple favored hiring non-immigrant visa holders over qualified U.S. citizens and permanent residents.

AI:
1. Researchers from China Propose iTransformer: Rethinking Transformer Architecture for Enhanced Time Series Forecasting
- Chinese researchers propose iTransformer, a novel architecture for time series forecasting based on the Transformer model.
- iTransformer incorporates attention mechanisms and self-supervised learning techniques to improve the accuracy and efficiency of time series predictions.

2. Are You Doing Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) for Biomedicine? Meet MedCPT: A Contrastive Pre-trained Transformer Model for Zero-Shot Biomedical Information Retrieval
- Introducing MedCPT, a pre-trained Transformer model designed for zero-shot biomedical information retrieval using the Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) framework.
- MedCPT demonstrates promising results in retrieving relevant biomedical information and can assist in various medical research tasks.

Insights:
- Microsoft's XOT shows the potential for improving language models' generalization abilities, making them more versatile in various tasks and domains.
- Rust's development in hardware capabilities opens up new possibilities for building secure and efficient hardware systems.
- SpaceX's upcoming launch of the X-37B highlights its capabilities in delivering payloads to space.
- Concerns arise among TikTok creators regarding the increasing number of ads on the platform's TikTok Shop.
- Wiley College's Fall Preview Day aims to attract prospective students for the upcoming academic year.
- Apple's settlement over hiring practices sheds light on the issue of discrimination against immigrants.
- iTransformer and MedCPT showcase advancements in AI models for time series forecasting and biomedical information retrieval, respectively.

Overall, this report highlights advancements and developments in technology, business, and AI, showcasing the potential for innovation and addressing challenges in various fields.
